messages.messageBody:
Sonia,
It looks as if Buzz gave you better info than I could have, I'm very new
to the unschooling scene. As for cost of living, a two bdrm house in To in
a reasonable neighbourhood, about $250,000, obviously it can go up alot
from there, not down very much unless your REALLY into home renovation. As
for the burbs, that depends on how far you want to drive, One hour drive
which is very suburban, varies alot. Ie. New subcivisions ar aften around
200,000, but very crowded, if you are willing top drive a bit further and
live more in the country less. Depends which direction you drive. Maybe
I'll see you on the Toronto Homeschool list.


I've unsubscribed, not because this wasn't fascinating, just too much
volume at this stage of my life.

Good luck Holly finding work.

Christine
